summary: This is an email chain from March 2021 between US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) staff, discussing follow-up actions regarding Jeffrey Epstein's estate. The emails concern obtaining photos and subpoenaing passenger manifests from Epstein's planes.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as 'JE' in the email; his estate is being contacted by the US Attorney's Office for photos and flight manifests.

events.title: Initial request to contact Epstein estate
events.description: An email was sent requesting a colleague to contact Jeffrey Epstein's estate to follow up on an agreement to provide photos and to flag a planned subpoena for passenger manifests from Epstein's planes.

events.title: Reminder to follow up with Epstein estate
events.description: A reminder email was sent to the team regarding the need to contact Epstein's estate for photos and to serve a subpoena for passenger manifests from his planes.

keyFacts: The US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) was actively investigating Jeffrey Epstein's activities as of early 2021, after his death.
The office had a prior agreement with Epstein's estate to obtain photos, which they were following up on.
The office planned to subpoena Epstein's estate for passenger manifests from his planes, indicating an interest in identifying individuals who traveled with him.
